H0.text: What video game, created by Notch, is the best-selling PC game of all-time. Minecraft

H1.text: What video game, created by Notch, is the best-selling PC game of all-time. Terraria

H2.text: What video game, created by Notch, is the best-selling PC game of all-time. Dwarf Fortress

H3.text: What video game, created by Notch, is the best-selling PC game of all-time. Mcpvp

A4.text: As of 10 October 2014, the game had sold 17 million copies on PC, becoming the best-selling PC game of all time.

A5.text: By March 2012, Minecraft had become the 6th best-selling PC game of all time.
